title: Joy Wibowo
text: Joy Wibowo is a self taught Software Engineer who learned programming languages from early 2013. He was contributing to several crypto projects namely; Trust Wallet, Forbole, Polygon, Ignite, Kyber, Blockscout, and Consensus Layer at Ethereum

title: M Fathurridho
text: Previously worked for MENA based Export Company and one of Indonesian Edu-tech Startups.

title: Jerry Madez
text: Have been around the crypto space for the past 5 year, experience DeFi NFTs Blockchain generaly and experience trader in the financial market.

title: Paksi Amarendra
text: Paksi Amarendra previously worked for several global launchpad platform with huge networking and investor relations. He is also rapidly evolving landscape of blockchain technology and decentralized finance (DeFi)

title: Agung Purnomo
text: Agung Purnomo is the owner of a furniture exporter company with huge experience in global export-import business. He is also a member of Indonesian market regulator association (Asparindo) with huge networking across decision makers.

title: Mario Prakoso
text: Mario Prakoso is a human right activist and a host behind a press media program that discusses policies and justice issues.
